Installation PaperMod Installation Guide
安裝 Hugo
1 2 3 4 ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" brew install hugo hugo new site <site-name> --format yaml cd <site-name> 選擇主題並下載，我選擇PaperMod
Related YT tutorial
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 git clone https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod themes/PaperMod --depth=1 # If you want to update the theme cd themes/PaperMod git pull # Start Hugo server hugo server Setup hugo.yaml 參考 PaperMod Installation Guide, 直接修改 hugo.yaml，我還有很多features沒有研究透徹…
